abstract: Activity and inactivity (dormancy) periods of the land snail Helix aspena MÃœller were monitored at monthly intervals during two years in two natural populations in Galicia (NW-Spain), one m an area of Mediterranean climatic influence and another in an Atlantic -climate area The annual activity cycles of H aspena in Galicia are consistent with latitudinal adjustments of the life cycle of this species which shows a very wide distribution range, but also showed some special features related to the particular microclimate of each locality
